attributes.action: Give the schools more authority when dealing with bullies and also to give more support to the schools on the issue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We at the BBABC (Big Big Anti Bullying Campaign) are supporting youths who are been bullied and who have been bullied. We need the support of the Country to sign this petition to force our PM and Education Secretary to give the schools more authority when dealing with bullies and also to give more support to the schools on the issue

Happy Signing and Thank You

Aaron Gardner
CEO The BBABC
